profile.name: Saood Ghare
intro: Full Stack Developer with a Mechanical Engineering background, leveraging analytical problem-solving skills to build scalable web applications. Specialized in Next.js, React, and Laravel, with a focus on high-performance e-commerce solutions and complex API integrations.

Currently working as a Full Stack Developer at Ahmed Al Maghribi Perfumes in Ajman, UAE, where I orchestrate cloud deployments, integrate payment gateways like Tabby/Tamara, and architect cross-device cart systems.
Previously at AutomateBuddy Technologies, I specialized in building enterprise-grade interfaces with React.js and Redux Toolkit, and developed secure backend systems using .NET Core and PostgreSQL.

I enjoy translating business requirements into optimized, user-centric code. Whether architecting a 'K-Series' launch page with GSAP animations or optimizing server performance for 99.9% uptime, I am driven by impact and efficiency.
profile.contactMessage: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Connect with me on my social platforms or drop me an email.

projects.title: Ahmed Al Maghribi
projects.description: Architected a multi-region headless e-commerce platform managing 6 country codebases. Engineered a persistent cross-device cart system, integrated fintech APIs (Tabby/Tamara), and built high-performance landing pages using Next.js 14 and GSAP animations.

projects.title: The Diet Cascade
projects.description: Delivered a high-performance custom web solution for the healthcare sector. Achieved 100% Google Lighthouse scores for Performance and SEO by optimizing asset loading and server response times on Hostinger.

projects.title: Procon Media
projects.description: Developed a fully responsive digital agency interface using Tailwind CSS. Optimized the deployment pipeline via cPanel to ensure SSL compliance, fast rendering, and maximum search engine visibility for lead generation.
